meanings.definition: A test of knowledge, typically as a competition or for entertainment.
meanings.sent1: During the quiz, students answered questions to show what they knew.
meanings.sent2: The quiz at the end of the week covered all the topics we learned.
meanings.sent3: The quiz turned into a fun game as everyone tried to answer quickly.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a quiz, challenging her to recall facts under pressure.
meanings.sent5: The quiz was like a puzzle, each question a piece to solve.

meanings.sent1: The detective will quiz the suspect to gather more information.
meanings.sent2: She decided to quiz her friends about their favorite movies.
meanings.sent3: He liked to quiz his little sister about her favorite toys.
meanings.sent4: The teacher would quiz the students to check their understanding.
meanings.sent5: The journalist will quiz the politician about the recent scandal.
